name: Revenge of the C5
overview:
The evil newspaper reporters are out for a "scoop", and have sent an army of "nasties" to stop our hero from proving the safety and reliability of his C5 electric car.

You have been chosen to drive the C5 in the British cross-country finals. You will need all your skill and nerve to complete the 40 stage course and finish in 1st position, thus ensuring our hero the front page story he deserves rather than the "scoop" the newspapers would like to print.

Revenge of the C5 is a game dedicated to the Sinclair C5 that got banned from British roads for being dangerous
